title: [Control systems] Siemens security advisory (AV25-765)
description: On November 17, 2025, Siemens published advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Mendix RichText  versions prior to V4.6.1
PS/IGES Parasolid Translator Component  versions prior to V29.0.258
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
